text: The 1952 Honduran Amateur League was the sixth edition of the Honduran Amateur League. Club Aduana Deportivo obtained its 1st national title. The season ran from 6 April to 19 October 1952.DiarioMas.hn – Los 37 títulos de liga del Olimpia en base a ley – 12 July 2016 ==Regional champions== For the first time the department of Choluteca included a team to participate in the national championship. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Regional championship !!
